description:
Transport ships on the frontier have been falling prey to strange attacks and the UPSF is unsure as to whether the Raalgon are the ones responsible. Yuriko Star has been brought on to analyze the occurrences, but she soon finds herself the target of a mysterious effort to obscure her investigation. Receiving bizarre phone calls, a mysterious package... Could she have a stalker?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: If Only the Skies Would Clear Part 1
Wenn es nur aufklaren würde - Teil 1
